page.title: 09ASHDON,ORGANISATIONS,(cont.)
page.content: {Ashdon WI}was formed in May 1918.At the first meeting there were 54 people present.Current membership is now 52. Meetings are held on the 2nd Thursday of each month.Although the movement is known for "jam and cakes"it provides many other interests including sports such as rounders,badmington,golf,darts and tennis tournaments. {Ashdon}Players,our local dramatic group,was formed 17 years ago.In the beginning this society had 22 players now they have 17 members.They used to perform two plays a year,but now they do one pantomine just before Christmas. {Ashdon}Brownie Pack was formed in June 1960 by Mrs.Williams who still runs the pack.There were 12 brownies in 1960,today there are 18 members. The sixes are ;Imps,Gnomes,Kelpie and Sprites.
